verbose_text: The first attempt to identify genes upregulated during F. tularensis growth inside cells utilized a promoter " trap " construct in which chromosomal DNA fragments were cloned in the plasmid pKK214, to identify promoters that drive expression of a chloramphenicol reporter gene, which led to survival in chloramphenicol treated host cells.
evidence: chloramphenicol reporter gene, which led to survival in chloramphenicol
